CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Quality_of_answers_for_TCM__c , 'Very Dissatisfied') , 1, IF(ISPICKVAL(Quality_of_answers_for_TCM__c , 'Somewhat Dissatisfied'),2, IF(ISPICKVAL(Quality_of_answers_for_TCM__c , 'Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied'),3, IF(ISPICKVAL(Quality_of_answers_for_TCM__c , 'Somewhat satisfied'),4, IF(ISPICKVAL(Quality_of_answers_for_TCM__c , 'Very satisfied'),5,null) ))))
CustomField.label: Quality of answers
